name: LAPTOP BAG
specification: MATERIAL: Premium quality durable fabric with leatherite finish handles
DESIGN: Slim, lightweight, and professional design for business use
COMPARTMENTS: Multiple organized sections for laptop, tablet, charger, documents, and stationery
STRAP: Adjustable and detachable shoulder strap with padded handles for comfort
CLOSURE: Smooth zipper with sturdy pullers
features: BRAND: Customisable with company logo or name
SIZE: Fits laptops up to 15.6 inches
UTILITY: Ideal for professionals, corporate gifting, client welcome kits, and employee appreciation
SAFETY: Soft padded lining to protect laptop and gadgets
STYLE: Sleek and modern look, perfect for daily commute and business travel
